title: PermaBan
body:
Hi Riot Games.
I wanted to ask you if you would cancel my permaban. You know my friend is a hacker and he can get to whom he wants an account. He chose me because he knew I was playing League of Legends and didn't want to create an account because he thought someone could come to him. And when he gets into my account, he does what he wants. He once asked me if I wanted Riot Points to hack them because he knows it. I didn't let him. He is a very toxic player and all the curses that are in the games are not mine but his. For all those mines, he and I can't. So please, Riot Games, cancel permaban. Sorry for my English. And when you cancel it, I promise you that nothing will ever happen again, and I may report that friend for hacking. I should have done it a long time ago.

My nickname: 6BollingRigin6
My region: North America

Thank you very much for your time.
Have a nice day.

replies.body:
From the **Terms of Use** (emphasis mine):

>When you create an account with us, we require you to select a unique username and password (collectively, your “Login Credentials”), which you’ll use each time you access the Game. ***You can’t share your account or Login Credentials with anyone. You can’t sell, transfer or allow any other person to access your account or Login Credentials, or offer to do so. You’re entirely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your Login Credentials.*** Please notify us immediately if you become aware of any breach of security, including any loss, theft or unauthorized disclosure of your Login Credentials.

"you know my friend is a hacker and can get into whatever account he wants"

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/P1r6IWGN3EA/maxresdefault.jpg

"my friend hacks and asked if I wanted RP because he can hack them for me"

https://i.redd.it/9n9whwhmx8q11.jpg

"If you unban me I'll make sure my hacker friend, who I can't stop, will never hack my account again"

https://i.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/facebook/000/017/354/elrisitas.jpg
Yeah, accountsharing is not allowed and punished with a instant permaban, so that excuse doesnt work. You say you deserved it, so it will stay, permanent.

Account-sharing is an additional reason for Riot to keep your account permabanned, not a reason to lift the ban. Riot doesn't want to deal with "but it wasn't I who cheated/flamed/AFKed, it was my friend/brother/sister/roommate!" all the time.
